originalResponse.title: WordPress.com Site

originalResponse.description: Sell stuff right on your blog with Ecwid and Shopify.

originalResponse.title: Custom site address
originalResponse.description: Make your site easier to find and easier to remember.

originalResponse.title: Space
originalResponse.description: Increase your available storage space and add the ability to upload audio files.

1.title: Media storage
1.description: Upload up to 3GB of photos, videos, or music.

1003.title: Expanded media storage
1003.description: Upload up to 13GB of photos, videos, or music.

1008.title: Unlimited media storage
1008.description: You can upload unlimited photos, videos, or music.

originalResponse.title: No ads
originalResponse.description: WordPress.com ads will not display on your site.

originalResponse.title: Custom fonts, colors, & CSS
originalResponse.description: Change your theme's font, colors, and CSS for a unique look

originalResponse.title: Video storage & hosting
originalResponse.description: Upload and host videos on your site without advertising.

originalResponse.title: Unlimited Premium Themes
originalResponse.description: Exclusive access to our best themes. Try many as you like.

originalResponse.title: Google Analytics
originalResponse.description: Google Analytics is a free service that offers a complementary view of your traffic to our built-in Stats feature.
